《黑澀會》薔薔誇張行徑惹流氓　差點被西瓜刀砍
06 Nov 2019, 09:50 by 張詠淇
緯來綜合台實境節目《歡迎光琳》邀請女藝人楊繡惠、薔薔、蘿莉塔、解婕翎齊聚一堂吃飯聊天，這4位女星都有著性格直率，幽默犀利的共通點，是演藝圈的「正義俠女」，她們分享許多精彩的事蹟，主持人沈玉琳聽了都驚嘆：「這些都可以當『楊繡惠接班人』了！」
林嘉凌（薔薔）自《我愛黑澀會》出道，作風嗆辣、敢說敢言，大膽風格深受許多粉絲喜愛。薔薔更自豪不向惡勢力低頭，她自爆：「有次跟朋友去逛夜市，我們莫名其妙被流氓盯上，而且竟還被他腳『不小心』踢到。」這一腳讓她氣炸：「換我回擊一個『不是故意的』腳踹回去！」結果流氓開始對薔薔挑釁，她竟還比出中指回應，這時對方已經亮出西瓜刀，薔薔坦言：「其實我當時超怕，雙腿根本都在顫抖，但氣勢要有，我依然怒狠狠瞪他！」沈玉琳聽聞玩笑表示：「那妳趕快拿顆西瓜給他砍半，讓他消消氣。」
同桌女星蘿莉塔個性直爽率真，骨子裡同樣存在『正義之氣』，甚至還因此研究不雅影片！她解釋：「因為常會號稱某藝人不雅影片外流，我都會反覆研究然後給專家朋友們鑑定。」然後自己會再回去留言，告訴大家是假的。沈玉琳反嗆她：「妳幹嘛雞婆讓男人幻想破滅！」
蘿莉塔還說對爸爸的外遇很不能諒解，「爸爸還在世時我還能忍氣吞聲，爸爸過世後我再也受不了！」她坦言為了幫家人出氣，在告別式致詞台上直接指著爸爸的再娶是「破壞家庭的小三、狐狸精」，還欲罷不能搶著麥克風繼續講，脫稿演出讓全場都很傻眼！
更新時間｜2019.11.06 09:49

"Black Skull" 蔷蔷 exaggerated acts provoke hooligans almost chopped by watermelon knife
06 Nov 2019, 09:50 by Zhang Yiqi
The latitude comprehensive platform reality program "Welcome to Guanglin" invites female artists Yang Xiuhui, 蔷蔷, Lolita, and Jiexi to gather together to eat and chat. These four actresses all have a straightforward character and a common sense of humor and sharpness. The circle of "Justice", they shared a lot of wonderful deeds, the host Shen Yulin heard and said: "These can be "Yang Xiuhui successor"!"
Lin Jialing (蔷蔷) debuted from "I Love Black Skull", with a style of enthusiasm, dare to speak up, and bold style is loved by many fans. I am more proud not to bow to the evil forces. She blew herself up: "I went to the night market with my friends. We were inexplicably stared at by the rogue, and I was kicked by his feet "inadly." This foot made her angry. : "For me to return a "not intentional" ankle back!" The result of the rogue began to provoke a slap in the face, she actually responded to the middle finger, then the other party has already shown the watermelon knife, and said frankly: "In fact, I was too afraid The legs are shaking all the time, but the momentum is there, I still scream at him!" Shen Yulin heard a joke and said: "Let's take a watermelon and cut him half, let him get rid of it."
At the same time, the actress Lolita has a straightforward personality, and there is also a "justice" in the bones, and even study indecent films! She explained: "Because I often call a certain artist an indecent film, I will repeat the research and then identify it to the experts and friends." Then I will go back to leave a message and tell everyone that it is a fake. Shen Yulin retorted her: "Why do you want to make a man disillusioned!"
Lolita also said that she couldn't understand the father's affair. "My father can still swallow when he is still alive. I can't take it anymore after my father passed away!" She admitted that in order to help her family, she pointed directly to Dad on the farewell platform. The resurgence is "the destruction of the family's third, fox", but also want to stop rushing to the microphone to continue to speak, the release of the show makes the audience very stupid!
